table.name: vtiger_bankguarantee
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_bankguarantee` ( `bankguaranteeid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `equipment_model` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bankguaranteeid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bankguaranteecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_bankguaranteecf` ( `bankguaranteeid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bankguaranteeid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
